TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DomainUpDown extends System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase

summary.span: 表示显示字符串值的 Windows 数字显示框（也称为 up-down 控件）。

span.span: Represents a Windows spin box (also known as an up-down control) that displays string values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件显示单个字符串值，该值是通过单击控件的向上或向下按钮从 集合中选择的。A control displays a single string value that is selected from an collection by clicking the up or down buttons of the control. 用户还可以在控件中输入文本，除非 属性设置为 `true` （键入的字符串必须与要接受的集合中的项相匹配）。The user can also enter text in the control, unless the property is set to `true` (the string typed in must match an item in the collection to be accepted). 选择某个项后，该对象将转换为字符串值，以便可以在数字显示框中显示该对象。When an item is selected, the object is converted to a string value so it can be displayed in the spin box. 若要创建要在 控件中显示的对象集合，可以通过使用 和 方法单独添加或移除项。To create a collection of objects to display in the control, you can add or remove the items individually by using the and methods. 这可以在事件处理程序中调用，如按钮的 事件。This can be called in an event handler, such as the event of a button. 可以通过将 属性设置为 `true`，按字母顺序对对象集合进行排序。The object collection can be sorted alphabetically by setting the property to `true`. 当 属性设置为 `true`时，如果滚动到集合中的最后一个或第一个对象，则该列表将分别以第一个或最后一个对象开始，并显示为连续列表。When the property is set to `true`, if you scroll past the last or first object in the collection, the list will start over with the first or last object respectively and appear to roll in a continuous list. 当调用 或 方法（在代码中或通过单击向上或向下按钮）时，将调用 来使用新字符串更新控件。When the or methods are called, either in code or by the click of the up or down buttons, is called to update the control with the new string. 如果 设置为 `true`，则在更新控件的文本显示之前，字符串与集合中的某个值相匹配。If is set to `true`, the string is matched to one of the values in the collection prior to updating the control's text display. 从 .NET Framework 4.6 开始，当 app.config 文件包含以下项时，将根据系统 DPI 设置调整 控件的大小：Starting with the .NET Framework 4.6, the control will be resized based on the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ```   ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化 控件。The following code example creates and initializes a control. 该示例允许您设置它的一些属性，并创建一个字符串集合，以便在数字显示框中显示。The example allows you to set some of its properties and create a collection of strings for display in the spin box. 此代码假定已在窗体中实例化 、和 。The code assumes that a , , and have been instantiated on a form. 该示例还假设类级别的成员变量声明为名为 `myCounter`的32位带符号整数。The example also assumes that you have a member variable at the class level declared as a 32-bit signed integer named `myCounter`. 单击该按钮时，可以在文本框中输入字符串，并将其添加到 集合。You can enter a string in the text box and add it to the collection when the button is clicked. 通过单击此复选框，可以切换 属性，并观察数字显示框中项的集合中的差异。By clicking the check box, you can toggle the property and observe the difference in the collection of items in the spin box. [!code-cpp[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不显式调用 方法，则在引用 属性时将会调用此方法。If you do not explicitly call the method, it will be called when the property is referenced. > [!NOTE] > 要获取或设置 属性，必须添加对与 .NET Framework 一起安装的 Accessibility 程序集的引用。To get or set the property, you must add a reference to the Accessibility assembly installed with the .NET Framework.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写 时，不应调用基类的 方法。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, you should not call the base class's method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void DownButton() cil managed

summary.span: 显示对象集合中的下一项。

span.span: Displays the next item in the object collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您使用 "下一步" 按钮在 控件中的项集合中移动时，最终会到达集合中的最后一项。As you move through the collection of items in the control using the down button, you will eventually reach the last item in the collection. 如果继续操作，并且 设置为 `true`，则列表将从集合中的第一项开始，看起来是连续的。If you continue, and is set to `true`, the list will start over with the first item in the collection and appear to be continuous. 当使用 up 按钮在集合中移动时，也会发生此行为。This behavior also occurs when you move through the collection using the up button.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Items As DomainUpDown.DomainUpDownItemCollection

summary.span: 分配给数字显示框（也称为 up-down 控件）的对象集合。

span.span: A collection of objects assigned to the spin box (also known as an up-down control).
A that contains an collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过两种方式生成 集合并将其提供给 控件。The collection can be built and made available to the control in two ways. 您可以使用 或 方法向集合中添加项。You can add items to the collection by using the or methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化 控件。The following code example creates and initializes a control. 该示例允许您设置它的一些属性，并创建一个字符串集合，以便在数字显示框中显示。The example allows you to set some of its properties and create a collection of strings for display in the spin box. 此代码假定已在窗体中实例化 、和 。The code assumes that a , , and have been instantiated on a form. 该示例还假设类级别的成员变量声明为名为 `myCounter`的32位带符号整数。The example also assumes that you have a member variable at the class level declared as a 32-bit signed integer named `myCounter`. 单击该按钮时，可以在文本框中输入字符串，并将其添加到 集合。You can enter a string in the text box and add it to the collection when the button is clicked. 通过单击此复选框，可以切换 属性，并观察数字显示框中项的集合中的差异。By clicking the check box, you can toggle the property and observe the difference in the collection of items in the spin box. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化 控件。The following code example creates and initializes a control. 该示例允许您设置它的一些属性，并创建一个字符串集合，以便在数字显示框（也称为 up-down 控件）中显示。The example allows you to set some of its properties and create a collection of strings for display in the spin box (also known as an up-down control). 此代码假定已在窗体中实例化 、和 。The code assumes that a , , and have been instantiated on a form. 该示例还假设类级别的成员变量声明为名为 `myCounter`的32位带符号整数。The example also assumes that you have a member variable at the class level declared as a 32-bit signed integer named `myCounter`. 单击该按钮时，可以在文本框中输入字符串，并将其添加到 集合。You can enter a string in the text box and add it to the collection when the button is clicked. 通过单击此复选框，可以切换 属性，并观察数字显示框中项的集合中的差异。By clicking the check box, you can toggle the property and observe the difference in the collection of items in the spin box. [!code-cpp[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性设置为 `true`，则 控件将选择列表中以字符开头的项。If the property is set to `true`, the control chooses the item on the list that begins with the character. 如果集合中的多个项以相同字符开始，则 控件将从当前选定的位置开始选择以键入字符开头的下一项。If more than one item in the collection starts with the same character, the control selects the next item that begins with the typed character, starting from the currently selected position. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写 时，请确保调用基类的 " 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SelectedIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.SelectedIndex : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置选定项的索引值。

span.span: Gets or sets the index value of the selected item.

value.span: 选定项的从零开始的索引值。

span.span: The zero-based index value of the selected item.
The default value is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性保留数字显示框（也称为 up-down 控件）中当前选定的项在集合中的索引值。The property holds the index value of the item in the collection that is currently selected in the spin box (also known as an up-down control). 如果 属性已从 `false` 更改为 `true`，则可以重新分配新索引值。Collection items can be reassigned new index values if the property has been changed from `false` to `true`. 当集合按字母顺序重新排序时，将为这些项指定新的索引值。As the collection is re-sorted alphabetically, the items will be assigned a new index value. > [!NOTE] > 如果用户已在数字显示框中输入了一个项，或者如果未选择任何项，则 值将为默认值-1。If the user has entered an item in the spin box, or if no item has been selected, the value will be the default value, -1. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化 控件。The following code example creates and initializes a control. 该示例允许您设置它的一些属性，并创建一个字符串集合，以便在数字显示框中显示。The example allows you to set some of its properties and create a collection of strings for display in the spin box. 此代码假定已在窗体中实例化 、和 。The code assumes that a , , and have been instantiated on a form. 该示例还假设类级别的成员变量声明为名为 `myCounter`的32位带符号整数。The example also assumes that you have a member variable at the class level declared as a 32-bit signed integer named `myCounter`. 单击该按钮时，可以在文本框中输入字符串，并将其添加到 集合。You can enter a string in the text box and add it to the collection when the button is clicked. 通过单击此复选框，可以切换 属性，并观察数字显示框中项的集合中的差异。By clicking the check box, you can toggle the property and observe the difference in the collection of items in the spin box. [!code-cpp[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic DomainUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic DomainUpDown Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The assigned value is less than the default, -1.
-or-
The assigned value is greater than the count.

The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性后，该值将被验证为集合中的一个项， 属性设置为相应的索引值。When this property is set, the value is validated to be one of the items in the collection, and the property is set to the appropriate index value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化 控件。The following code example creates and initializes a control. 该示例允许您设置它的一些属性，并创建一个字符串集合，以便在数字显示框（也称为 up-down 控件）中显示。The example allows you to set some of its properties and create a collection of strings for display in the spin box (also known as an up-down control). 此代码假定已在窗体中实例化 、和 。The code assumes that a , , and have been instantiated on a form. 该示例还假设类级别的成员变量声明为名为 `myCounter`的32位带符号整数。The example also assumes that you have a member variable at the class level declared as a 32-bit signed integer named `myCounter`. 单击该按钮时，可以在文本框中输入字符串，并将其添加到 集合。You can enter a string in the text box and add it to the collection when the button is clicked. 通过单击此复选框，可以切换 属性，并观察数字显示框中项的集合中的差异。By clicking the check box, you can toggle the property and observe the difference in the collection of items in the spin box. summary.span: 在更改 属性后发生。

span.span: Occurs when the property has been changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要发生 事件，用户可以在代码中更改 属性，用户可以在新值中键入内容，或单击控件的向上或向下按钮。For the event to occur, the property can be changed in code, by the user typing in a new value or clicking the control's up or down buttons. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 `DomainUpDown1` 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DomainUpDown1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 设置为 `true`时，集合将按字母顺序排序。When is set to `true`, the collection is sorted in alphabetical order. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化 控件。The following code example creates and initializes a control. 该示例允许您设置它的一些属性，并创建一个字符串集合，以便在数字显示框（也称为 up-down 控件）中显示。The example allows you to set some of its properties and create a collection of strings for display in the spin box (also known as an up-down control). 此代码假定已在窗体中实例化 、和 。The code assumes that a , , and have been instantiated on a form. 该示例还假设类级别的成员变量声明为名为 `myCounter`的32位带符号整数。The example also assumes that you have a member variable at the class level declared as a 32-bit signed integer named `myCounter`. 单击该按钮时，可以在文本框中输入字符串，并将其添加到 集合。You can enter a string in the text box and add it to the collection when the button is clicked. 通过单击此复选框，可以切换 属性，并观察数字显示框中项的集合中的差异。By clicking the check box, you can toggle the property and observe the difference in the collection of items in the spin box. summary.span: 返回表示 控件的字符串。

returns.span: 表示当前 的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回字符串包括 和 属性的类型和值。The return string includes the type and the values for the and properties.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void UpButton() cil managed

span.span: Displays the previous item in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你使用向上键在 控件中移动项的集合时，最终会到达集合中的第一项。As you move through the collection of items in the control using the up button, you will eventually reach the first item in the collection. 如果继续操作，并且 设置为 `true`，则列表将从集合中的最后一项开始，看起来是连续的。If you continue, and is set to `true`, the list will start over with the last item in the collection and appear to be continuous. 当您使用 "下一步" 按钮移动集合时，也会发生此行为。This behavior also occurs when you move through the collection using the down button.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void UpdateEditText() cil managed

summary.span: 更新数字显示框（也称为 up-down 控件）中的文本以显示选定项。

span.span: Updates the text in the spin box (also known as an up-down control) to display the selected item.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示如果用户继续滚动时超过了列表的末尾，项的集合是否继续第一项或最后一项。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the collection of items continues to the first or last item if the user continues past the end of the list.

value.span: 如果用户到达集合的开始或末尾时列表重新开始，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the list starts again when the user reaches the beginning or end of the collection; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性设置为 `true`时，如果到达集合中的最后一项并继续，则列表将从第一个项开始，看起来是连续的。When the property is set to `true`, if you reach the last item in the collection and continue, the list will start over with the first item and appear to be continuous. 此行为也会反向工作。This behavior works in reverse as well. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化 控件。The following code example creates and initializes a control. 该示例允许您设置它的一些属性，并创建一个字符串集合，以便在数字显示框（也称为 up-down 控件）中显示。The example allows you to set some of its properties and create a collection of strings for display in the spin box (also known as an up-down control). 此代码假定已在窗体中实例化 、和 。The code assumes that a , , and have been instantiated on a form. 该示例还假设类级别的成员变量声明为名为 `myCounter`的32位带符号整数。The example also assumes that you have a member variable at the class level declared as a 32-bit signed integer named `myCounter`. 单击该按钮时，可以在文本框中输入字符串，并将其添加到 集合。You can enter a string in the text box and add it to the collection when the button is clicked. 通过单击此复选框，可以切换 属性，并观察数字显示框中项的集合中的差异。By clicking the check box, you can toggle the property and observe the difference in the collection of items in the spin box.
